backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing product management, user profiles, purchases, and admin‑gated actions with blob storage and role‑based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a frontend update‑request feature to its implementing files, components, and related tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theming and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access‑denied message with an icon and button to return to the storefront.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header with logo, navigation links, login button, and conditional admin/user displays.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with copyright, update‑request button opening a modal, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper combining the header, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button handling authentication state and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Card component showing product info, availability status, price, and link to product details.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that collects a user's name and saves their profile using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/RequestUpdateMod: Modal for entering update instructions with clipboard copy and close handling.
frontend/src/components/SearchAndFilterB: Search bar component that updates a query string via input changes.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontHero.t: Hero section displaying marketing text and a banner image for the storefront.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, product listing, and admin product mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind configuration defining light/dark theme variables, base typography, and layout utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard for managing products, including creation, editing, deletion, publishing, and file uploads.
frontend/src/pages/BuyerLibraryPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's purchased products and allows downloading files with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product information and enables authenticated users to purchase the item.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Lists all storefront products with search filtering, loading states, and optional profile setup prompts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s metadata, existing features, requirements, and current state version.
